title: Project Skins Release date
body: For those who haven't looked into it, Ranked games will be disabled at 01:30 PCT  September 2nd 2015 for the add on of the Project skins, I'm not 100% certain of this but this is what I have found, there are other sources saying its on 9/8 but I'm not sure, both of these sources were found on surrenderat20 please lemme know if you know the correct date if I am incorrect

replies.body:
http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/3qXbIdqV

>Be among the first to unlock new PROJECT skins from 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT

The skins are released on the 8th.
This is the correct information. The patch [5.17] went out on 9/2, but the PROJECT: skins will not be unlocking until the 8th.
when will project skins release exactly like at midnight pst?
They'll be here soon! (Not soon TM)
I saw this too but I also found my source too idk I guess I'll wait a few hours and find out soon enough haha, thanks for the source I appreciate it

> I also found my source too idk I guess I'll wait a few hours and find out soon enough haha
